data.title: Setting an Image to a label in Qt
data.meta_description:
I need to get a label image into a Qt Widget

I have tried putting a label on the widget then just on its properties on the right under text i selected pixmap and selected the image I wanted to use.
data.text: I need to get a label image into a Qt Widget I have tried putting a label on the widget then just on its properties on the right under text i selected pixmap and selected the image I wanted to use. However when I run the program no image appears any ideas why this is? I have also tried : QLabel label(""); label.show(); But had no luck do not think I was using it right
